TopicTitle: BUG: Can't Plan Nodes After Entering Craft from EVA

Articles.Content:
Just did 2 rescue kerbal from Kerbin orbit missions and everytime I entered the craft with the kerbal to rescue I couldn't plan nodes for the craft anymore. Actually the nodes can be set on the orbit but the information at the navball (dv, distance, heading indicator) doesn't show up. Always had to go to space center and return to craft to be able to plan nodes again. After returning to the craft the half-assed nodes actually were gone as if they never existed (unlike correct nodes which are saved). Obviously after an EVA there is something not correctly set or initialized when back in the craft.

KSP Version 1.2.0, Windows 64-bit

Mods: chatterer

Actually needs to be moved to technical support forum modded installs although i doubt it has anything to do with chatterer.

 

Edited October 13, 2016 by DocMoriarty
